Articles.Content:
It seems there is currently no way to add nodes to a procedural wing.  So we are basically stuck creating basic wing shapes.

Am I missing something?  I'm gonna need like 4 or 5 of these procedural wings clipped together to form the same wing shape on the craft you see below in my signature.   Anyone know how to add nodes to a procedural wing?

We also have no panels now, so being forced to clip wings together is worse than what we had to work with in KSP1.  All of the wings are teardrop so clipping them together is going to produce some sloppy results.

Edited February 27, 2023 by XLjedi
